Class InvalidEntityStateException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • java.lang.RuntimeException

            • io.spine.server.entity.InvalidEntityStateException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public final class InvalidEntityStateException
extends io.spine.validate.ValidationException
    Signals that an entity state does not pass validation.
    See Also:
